column2: NEW MEXICO DMV PRACTICE TEST
Question Text
column8: Answer3 Text

column2: 1. Drivers are required to yield to pedestrians in a crosswalk.
2. If involved in an accident, drivers should:
column4: avoid standing or walking in traffic lanes.
column6: stop their vehicle at or near the scene.
column8: turn off the ignitions of wrecked vehicles.

column2: 3. You are driving at night, and a vehicle comes toward you with their high beam headlights on. You should:
column8: look in the direction of the vehicle.

column2: 4. This road sign means:
column8: Merge

column2: 5. When there is a _______ at an intersection, you should come to a complete stop, yield to cross traffic/pedestrians, and then proceed when clear.
column8: a flashing red light

column2: 6. Double solid yellow lines mean:
column4: passing is not permitted in either direction.
column6: the lane to the left may pass.
column8: the lane to the right may pass.
column10: passing is permitted in either direction.

column2: 7. Drivers who have been drinking are more likely to:
column8: keep a safe following distance.

column2: 8. If driving in foggy weather, drivers should turn on their high-beams to increase the field of vision.
9. When you make a left turn from a two-way road into a four-lane highway, you must:
column4: enter the left lane, to the right of the center line.
column6: go straight through the intersection, and then make the turn.
column8: enter the right lane, to the left of the center line.
column10: enter the right lane. When traffic permits, you can move out of the left lane.

column2: 10. This road sign means:
column4: Drivers may proceed if the way is clear
column8: Drivers are about to enter a one way street the wrong way

column2: 11. To avoid hydroplaning you should:
column6: slow down when roads are wet.
column8: stay away from puddles and standing water.

column2: 12. A speed limit is the __________ speed at which a vehicle may legally travel on the road under ideal conditions.
column8: minimum

column2: 13. This road sign means:
column8: Divided highway ends

column2: 14. Never make a U-turn from:
column8: the left part of the lane nearest to the centerline of the roadway.

column2: 15. This road sign warns drivers that:
column6: the one-way street or roadway is about to change to two-way traffic.
column8: they cannot go straight ahead.
column10: they are coming to a point where another traffic lane joins the one they are on.

column2: 16. What does a flashing yellow light mean?
column4: Drivers may move forward with caution.
column8: The same thing as a stop sign.

column2: 17. Drivers may cross a double yellow line to pass another vehicle if:
column4: the yellow line next to their side of the road is broken.
column6: the yellow line next to the other side of the road is broken.
column8: the vehicle ahead moves to the right to let them pass.

column2: 18. What is the main reason night driving is more difficult than daytime driving?
column8: The use of headlight is required by law.

column2: 19. If the vehicle you are driving starts to skid, you should:
column8: turn off the ignition.

column2: 20. You should always travel:
column4: according to weather and road conditions.
column8: at the speed of the vehicle behind.

column2: 21. The first sign drivers see when approaching a highway-rail intersection is usually:
column8: an advance warning sign.

column2: 22. This sign means:
column6: The divided highway on which drivers are traveling ends ahead.
column8: Intersection ahead.
column10: The highway ahead is divided into two one-way roadways.

column2: 23. In general, you should pass vehicles going in the same direction as you are going:
column4: only if the other driver signals it is safe.
column6: whenever you have the opportunity to do so.
column8: on the right.

column2: 24. A broken yellow line on your side of the roadway only means:
column4: Passing is not permitted on either side.
column6: Passing is permitted on your side of the roadway.
column8: Passing is permitted on both sides.

column2: 25. When you come to a flashing yellow light, you must:
column8: speed up to beat the red light.
